name: Adventures of Tristan
description: This is my first game made with Rpgmaker MV. Sorry if you encounter some frustrating bugs, I tried my best to eliminate all the bugs and crashes. As this is my first game ever, there are a lot of technical disadvantages, for instance, ranged combat is extremely buggy so I do not recommend using "bow" weapons. Save often, you might also want to have multiple save files. Thank you for playing my game.
